name: TapTapT
description:
**Featured at FreeAppsArcade.com! A new free app every day!**

* Watch the gameplay video at naquatic.com/taptapt *

Speed tapping...it's not for the faint of heart. You've got 10 seconds to show the world what you've got. With the clock winding down and a world record on the line, will you cramp up and fold under pressure...or ride your adrenaline rush to victory like a champion?

Compete against your friends and the entire world with online leaderboards as you go for the new screen tapping record.
